method.name: cwOnProcActBefore
cwOnProcActBefore
method.script: debugPrintln(stcc.getSysdateForLog() + "[" + this.process.id + "] - End User process 'Generate All Completion WOSUs'");

method.name: cwOnProcActBefore
method.script: debugPrintln(stcc.getSysdateForLog() + "[" + this.process.id + "] - Start User process 'Generate All Completion WOSUs'");
